reviews.review_msg: great professor who gives you every chance to do well. classes are short. she doesn't talk just to hear herself. i would take more of her courses.
mary is a good prof. be prepared to study.
great prof. easy to understand. easy to look at. SFU is lucky to have her.

Good teacher. Really try to help you understand. Take her time explaining things. I have to wait in a long line up for her office hours. BUEC 333 is hard, but it's do able. Must do well on homework to do well on exams. She always use one question from the homework in her exams. She is clear in her lecture. Her notes are neat.
